🤔 FAQ

How do I RSVP?

⎯⎯ We will be sending official RSVPs around Spring or Summer of 2024.

Can I bring kids?

⎯⎯ We're aiming for "explicit lyrics meets open bar" rather than "nursery rhymes meets apple juice." 18 and over, if you please!

Can I bring pets?

⎯⎯ Unfortunately, not. Our venue does not allow it.

Can I bring a pal? (+1)

⎯⎯ If you are allowed to bring additional guests, this site will tell you when you are RSVPing later. If you did not see that, then you must attend without any guests.

Can I bring alcohol?

⎯⎯ Please don't. We will have alcohol.

Will the ceremony be outdoors or indoors?

⎯⎯ It will be outdoors! Although the chance is low according to weather forecasting, we are planning to have coverage just in case it rains. Bring an umbrella if you want to be sure not to get wet.

What if I can't make it?

⎯⎯ No worries, make sure to RSVP that you can't make it, and/or let Joseph or Samantha know directly. Sooner the better, but no rush until you get the RSVP.

Will food and drinks be served at the reception? What kind of food?

⎯⎯ TBD

I still have questions, what do I do?!

⎯⎯ Please text Joseph or Samantha directly.
